details.top:
On the authority of Jaabir Ibn 'Adbullaah (radhi-yAllaahu 'anhu), he said: The Prophet (sal-Allaahu 'alayhe wa sallam) would instruct us to pray for guidance in all of our concerns, just as he would teach us a Soorah from the Quran.

He would say:'If any of you intends to undertake a matter then let him pray two supererogatory units [two rak'ah naafilah] of prayer and after which he should supplicate:
details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إني أستخيرك بعلمك، وأستقدرك بقدرتك، وأسألك من فضلك العظيم
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْتَخِيْرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ، وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ العَظِيْمِ
details.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'astakheeruka bi'ilmika, wa 'astaqdiruka biqudratika, wa 'as'aluka min fadhtikal-'A<u>dh</u>eemi,
details.translations: O Allah, I seek the counsel of Your Knowledge, and I seek the help of Your Omnipotence,

details.arabic_diacless: فإنك تقدر ولا أقدر، وتعلم ولا أعلم، وأنت علام الغيوب
details.arabic: فَإِنَّكَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا أَقْدِرُ، وَتَعْلَمُ وَلَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوْبِ
details.transliteration: fa'innaka taqdiru wa laa 'aqdiru, wa ta'lamu, wa laa 'a'lamu, wa 'Anta 'Allaamul-Ghuyoobi,
details.translations: and I beseech You for Your Magnificent Grace. Surely, You are Capable and I am not. You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen.

details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم إن كنت تعلم أن هٰذا الأمر (ويسمي حاجته) خير لي في ديني ومعاشي وعاقبة أمري، فاقدره لي ويسره لي ثم بارك لي فيه
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هٰذَا الْأَمْرَ (وَيُسَمِّي حَاجَتَهُ) خَيْرٌ لِيْ فِيْ دِيْنِيْ وَمَعَاشِيْ وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِيْ، فَاقْدُرْهُ لِيْ وَيَسِّرْهُ لِيْ ثُمَّ بَارِكْ لِيْ فِيْهِ
details.transliteration: Allaahumma 'in kunta ta'lamu 'anna haa<u>th</u>al-'amra- [then mention the thing to be decided] Khayrun lee fee deenee wa ma'aashee wa 'aaqibati 'amree - [or say] 'Aajilihi wa 'aajilihi - Faqdurhu lee wa yassirhu lee thumma baarik lee feehi,
details.translations: O Allah, if You know that this matter [then mention the thing to be decided] is good for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, - [or say: in this life and the afterlife] - then ordain it for me and make it easy for me, then bless me in it.

details.arabic_diacless: وإن كنت تعلم أن هٰذا الأمر شر لي في ديني ومعاشي وعاقبة أمري فاصرفه عني واصرفني عنه واقدر لي الخير حيث كان، ثم أرضني به
details.arabic: وَإِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هٰذَا الْأَمْرَ شَرٌّ لِيْ فِيْ دِيْنِيْ وَمَعَاشِيْ وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِيْ فَاصْرِفْهُ عَنِّيْ وَاصْرِفْنِيْ عَنْهُ وَاقْدُرْ لِيَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُ كَانَ، ثُمَّ أَرْضِنِيْ بِهِ
details.transliteration: wa 'in kunta ta'lamu 'anna haa<u>th</u>al-'amra sharrun lee fee deenee wa ma'aashee wa 'aaqibati 'amree - [or say] 'Aajilihi wa 'aajilihi - Fasrifhu 'annee wasrifnee 'anhu waqdur liyal-khayra haythu kaana thumma 'ardhinee bihi.
details.translations: And if You know that this matter is bad for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, - [or say: in this life and the afterlife] - then distance it from me, and distance me from it, and ordain for me what is good wherever it may be, and help me to be content with it.

details.top: Whoever seeks the counsel of the Creator will not regret it and whoever seeks the advice of the believers will feel confident about his decisions. Allah said in the Qur'an:
details.arabic_diacless: وشاورهم في الامر ۚفاذا عزمت فتوكل علي اللٰه
details.arabic: وَشَاوِرْهُمْ فِي الْاَمْرِ ۚفَاِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَي اللّٰهِ
details.transliteration: washawirhum fee al-amrifa-itha AAazamta fatawakkal AAala Allahi
details.translations: ...and consult them in the affair. Then when you have taken a decision put your trust in Allaah...

pageTitle: Istikharah (Seeking Allah's help in making a decision)
